class_notes: Permission Only - Program Approval to Take Courses Required
course_description: Methods for analyzing multivariable data in order to evaluate epidemiological research relationships between exposure and disease variables. Includes logistic regression (conditional and unconditional), risk ratio regression, risk difference regression, and survival analysis.
prerequisites: AEPI 530D and AEPI 534D and BIOS 516D and BIOS 517D as prerequisites or special permission required to enroll.
